doc.field: congratulations to jay inslee on his impactful campaign to bring the climate crisis to the forefront of the national conversation. there's no more important issue facing humanity. together we will work to pass a green new deal and create millions of jobs. senator cory booker saying, thank you jay inslee for advancing the conversation about the urgent threat of climate change, our country is better for it, i know you will continue to be a powerful voice and move
